title: 3 Simple Steps to Log Into Instagram on a Computer

steps.title: Go to https://www.instagram.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.instagram.com in a web browser. You can use Google Chrome , Safari, Mozilla Firefox, or another browser. This will open the login screen. If you're signed into someone else's account, click â˜° in the bottom-left corner and click "Log out" to sign out .

steps.title: Enter your login information.
steps.content: Enter your login information. You'll need your phone number, username, or email and your password to log in to Instagram on your PC or Mac. [1] X Research source If needed, you can reset your password .

steps.title: Click Log in.
steps.content: Click Log in . This is the blue button. You'll be logged into your Instagram account. Instagram is also available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .
